channel.title: Error_game_js5 HELP ME FIX :(
channel.description:
:confused: ok so i wanted my friend to be able to play... so i gave him the client download but when he trys to run it he gets this error error_game_js5 something like that how do i FIX IT ?
He's using the LD client i have the server turned on! i can login he cant? why not? mine connects through the localhost i think the problem is that the client isnt specified to connect to my Ip Address?? how do i change that ? i have a No-ip i have been trying for like 2 days now and i cant get it so my friends can login :\ i portforwarded and everything.
Help? Thanks. ~G0dz

item.title: Error_game_js5 HELP ME FIX :(
item.dc:creator: @G0dz_Tank G0dz Tank
item.description:
@G0dz_Tank wrote:

h4x0r88:

you dident portforward right. try again.

fixed my problem already and i did portforward right L i just had the client so that it would connect to localhost and not my ip :o…
